inputs.description: Alvo do scan (IP, URL ou dominio):

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] ENCODE - Preparar para IA
tasks.detail: Converte termos sensiveis para termos neutros antes de enviar para IA

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] RESTORE - Restaurar Original
tasks.detail: Restaura os termos originais apos receber resposta da IA

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] SMART RESTORE - Restaurar e Abrir
tasks.detail: Restaura os termos e foca o editor no arquivo

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] FULL CYCLE - Encode + Copy
tasks.command: $file = '${input:customFile}'; $result = C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe translator.py encode --file $file 2>&1; Write-Host $result; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { $content = Get-Content $file -Raw -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($content -and $content.Trim()) { Set-Clipboard -Value $content; Write-Host "`n>>> MEGAZORD: CONTEUDO SANITIZADO E COPIADO PARA CLIPBOARD!" -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host "`n>>> ERRO: Arquivo vazio!" -ForegroundColor Red } } else { Write-Host "`n>>> ERRO: Falha no encode" -ForegroundColor Red }
tasks.detail: Sanitiza, valida conteudo e copia para clipboard - pronto para CTRL+V na IA

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] STATS - Estatisticas
tasks.detail: Mostra estatisticas do arquivo work.txt e regras de traducao

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] PREVIEW - Ver Alteracoes
tasks.detail: Pre-visualiza as alteracoes sem modificar o arquivo

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] CHECK - Verificar Seguranca
tasks.detail: Verifica se o arquivo esta limpo (sem termos sensiveis)

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] HISTORY - Historico
tasks.detail: Exibe historico de todas as operacoes realizadas

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] UNDO - Desfazer Ultima
tasks.detail: Desfaz a ultima operacao de encode ou restore

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] VALIDATE - Validar Config
tasks.detail: Valida integridade do config.json e detecta conflitos

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] INTERACTIVE - Modo Console
tasks.detail: Inicia modo interativo com menu completo

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] OBFUSCATE - Ofuscar Variaveis
tasks.detail: Renomeia variaveis sensiveis para var_a1, var_b2, etc.

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] DEOBFUSCATE - Restaurar Variaveis
tasks.detail: Restaura nomes originais das variaveis ofuscadas

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] FULL TRANSFORM - Encode + Obfuscate
tasks.detail: Aplica encode semantico + ofuscacao de variaveis em um passo

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] GIT - SAFE DEPLOY
tasks.command: $check = C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe translator.py check 2>&1; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host '>>> Arquivo limpo - iniciando deploy...' -ForegroundColor Green; git add .; git commit -m '${input:commitMessage}'; git push origin main; Write-Host '>>> DEPLOY CONCLUIDO!' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host $check; Write-Host '>>> DEPLOY BLOQUEADO: Remova termos sensiveis antes do push!' -ForegroundColor Red }
tasks.detail: Comita e sobe pro Git APENAS se o codigo estiver sanitizado

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] GIT STATUS
tasks.detail: Mostra status do repositorio git

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] GIT PUSH
tasks.detail: Envia alteracoes para o GitHub

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] GIT COMMIT ALL
tasks.detail: Adiciona e comita todas as alteracoes

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] CLEAN - Limpar Backups
tasks.command: Remove-Item -Path backups -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Path .history.json -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Path .var_map.json -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'Backups e historico limpos!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Remove todos os backups e arquivos temporarios

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] LIST BACKUPS - Listar Backups
tasks.command: if (Test-Path backups) { Get-ChildItem backups -Name | Sort-Object -Descending } else { Write-Host 'Nenhum backup encontrado' -ForegroundColor Yellow }
tasks.detail: Lista todos os arquivos de backup existentes

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] CONFIG COUNT - Contar Regras
args: import json; d=json.load(open('core/config.json','r',encoding='utf-8')); r={k:v for k,v in d.items() if not k.startswith('_')}; print(f'Total de regras de traducao: {len(r)}')
tasks.detail: Conta o numero total de regras no config.json

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] START_HOG.bat
tasks.detail: Abre a interface grafica do LEVIATHAN

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] MCP SERVER - Iniciar
tasks.detail: Inicia o servidor MCP para traducao em tempo real

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] MCP TEST - Testar Servidor
tasks.detail: Testa se o servidor MCP esta funcionando

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] HTTP TOOLKIT - Iniciar Interceptador
tasks.detail: Abre a interface de manipulacao de requisicoes com protecao HOG

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] HTTP TOOLKIT - Testar Endpoint
args: import json; from http_toolkit import HOGDispatcher; d = HOGDispatcher(); print(json.dumps(d.dispatch('${input:targetUrl}', '${input:httpMethod}'), indent=2))
tasks.detail: Testa um endpoint com protecao HOG integrada

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] HTTP TOOLKIT - Scan Rapido
tasks.detail: Executa logic_stress_analysis no endpoint

tasks.label: [ADB] Listar Dispositivos
tasks.detail: Lista todos os dispositivos ADB conectados com detalhes

tasks.label: [ADB] Shell Interativo
tasks.detail: Abre shell interativo no dispositivo Android

tasks.label: [ADB] Instalar APK
tasks.detail: Instala APK com reinstall e grant de permissoes

tasks.label: [ADB] Extrair APK de App
tasks.command: $path = adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell pm path ${input:packageName} | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace 'package:','' }; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} pull $path.Trim() .\${input:packageName}.apk; Write-Host "APK salvo: ${input:packageName}.apk" -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Extrai APK instalado do dispositivo para o PC

tasks.label: [ADB] Screenshot
tasks.command: adb -s ${input:adbDevice} exec-out screencap -p > screenshot_$(Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss').png; Write-Host 'Screenshot salvo!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Captura screenshot do dispositivo

tasks.label: [ADB] Listar Apps Instalados
tasks.command: adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell pm list packages -3 | Sort-Object
tasks.detail: Lista todos os apps de terceiros instalados

tasks.label: [ADB] Logcat Filtrado
tasks.detail: Captura logcat filtrado por package

tasks.label: [ADB] Force Stop App
tasks.command: adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell am force-stop ${input:packageName}; Write-Host 'App parado: ${input:packageName}' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Forca parada de um app

tasks.label: [ADB] Limpar Dados do App
tasks.command: adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell pm clear ${input:packageName}; Write-Host 'Dados limpos: ${input:packageName}' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Limpa todos os dados e cache do app

tasks.label: [ADB] Configurar Proxy
tasks.command: adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell settings put global http_proxy $(hostname -I | ForEach-Object { $_.Trim() }):8080; Write-Host 'Proxy configurado!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Configura proxy HTTP no dispositivo apontando para este PC

tasks.label: [ADB] Remover Proxy
tasks.command: adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell settings put global http_proxy :0; Write-Host 'Proxy removido!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Remove proxy HTTP do dispositivo

tasks.label: [ADB] Port Forward
tasks.command: adb -s ${input:adbDevice} forward tcp:27042 tcp:27042; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} forward tcp:27043 tcp:27043; Write-Host 'Port forward 27042/27043 (Frida) ativo!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Configura port forward para Frida (27042/27043)

tasks.label: [ADB] Info do Dispositivo
tasks.command: Write-Host '=== DEVICE INFO ===' -ForegroundColor Cyan; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell getprop ro.product.model; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell getprop ro.build.version.release; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell getprop ro.product.manufacturer; Write-Host '=== MEMORIA ===' -ForegroundColor Cyan; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell cat /proc/meminfo | Select-Object -First 3; Write-Host '=== DISCO ===' -ForegroundColor Cyan; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell df -h /data | Select-Object -First 2
tasks.detail: Mostra info completa do dispositivo (modelo, Android, RAM, disco)

tasks.label: [ADB] Gravar Tela
tasks.command: Write-Host 'Gravando por 30s... Ctrl+C para parar' -ForegroundColor Yellow; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell screenrecord /sdcard/recording.mp4 --time-limit 30; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} pull /sdcard/recording.mp4 .; Write-Host 'Video salvo: recording.mp4' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Grava tela do dispositivo por 30 segundos

tasks.label: [ADB] TCP Dump (Captura Rede)
tasks.command: Write-Host 'Capturando trafego por 30s...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell su -c 'tcpdump -i any -w /sdcard/capture.pcap -c 5000'; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} pull /sdcard/capture.pcap .; Write-Host 'Captura salva: capture.pcap' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Captura trafego de rede do dispositivo com tcpdump

tasks.label: [ADB] Conectar WiFi
tasks.command: adb -s ${input:adbDevice} tcpip 5555; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; $ip = (adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell ip addr show wlan0 | Select-String 'inet ' | ForEach-Object { ($_ -split '\s+')[2] -split '/' | Select-Object -First 1 }); adb connect "$ip`:5555"; Write-Host "Conectado via WiFi: $ip`:5555" -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Conecta ADB via WiFi (dispositivo deve estar conectado via USB)

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Setup Server no Device
tasks.command: C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe -c "import subprocess,platform,urllib.request,zipfile,os,shutil; arch='x86' if 'x86' in subprocess.getoutput('adb shell getprop ro.product.cpu.abi') else 'arm64'; print(f'Arch: {arch}'); ver=subprocess.getoutput('frida --version').strip(); print(f'Frida: {ver}'); url=f'https://github.com/frida/frida/releases/download/{ver}/frida-server-{ver}-android-{arch}.xz'; print(f'Downloading {url}...'); urllib.request.urlretrieve(url, 'frida-server.xz'); os.system('adb push frida-server /data/local/tmp/frida-server'); os.system('adb shell chmod 755 /data/local/tmp/frida-server'); os.system('adb shell su -c /data/local/tmp/frida-server &'); print('Frida server running!')"
tasks.detail: Auto-detecta arch, baixa frida-server correto e inicia no device

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Listar Processos
tasks.detail: Lista todos os processos rodando via USB

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Listar Apps
tasks.detail: Lista todos os apps instalados via Frida

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Bypass SSL Pinning
tasks.detail: Spawna app com bypass SSL (21 camadas: OkHttp, Conscrypt, Flutter, OpenSSL)

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Bypass Root Detection
tasks.detail: Spawna app com bypass de deteccao de root

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Bypass Emulator Detection
tasks.detail: Spawna app com bypass de deteccao de emulador

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Bypass ALL (Nuclear)
tasks.detail: Spawna app com TODOS os bypasses (SSL + Root + Emulator + Frida + Integrity)

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Interceptar Crypto
tasks.detail: Intercepta Cipher, Mac, MessageDigest, SecretKey - mostra chaves e dados

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Interceptar Rede
tasks.detail: Intercepta send/recv/HTTP/OkHttp - mostra URL, headers, body

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Game Inspector
tasks.detail: Inspector para jogos mobile - hooks de Unity, Cocos2d, protocolo, memoria

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Dump Classes Java
tasks.detail: Lista classes Java carregadas filtrando pelo padrao informado

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Hook Metodo Java
tasks.detail: Hook metodo Java - mostra args e retorno em tempo real

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Trace com frida-trace
tasks.detail: Trace automatico de todas as chamadas que matcham o padrao

tasks.label: [FRIDA] Attach a App Rodando
tasks.detail: Attach Frida a app ja em execucao (REPL interativo)

tasks.label: [GHIDRA] Analisar Binario
tasks.command: C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe -c "import subprocess; r=subprocess.run(['analyzeHeadless','ghidra_projects','auto_project','-import','${input:binaryPath}','-overwrite','-postScript','ListFunctions.py','-scriptPath','core/ghidra'],capture_output=True,text=True); print(r.stdout[-3000:] if len(r.stdout)>3000 else r.stdout); print(r.stderr[-1000:] if r.stderr else '')"
tasks.detail: Analise headless completa do binario (ELF, PE, .so, .dll)

tasks.label: [GHIDRA] Listar Funcoes
tasks.detail: Lista todas as funcoes do ultimo binario analisado

tasks.label: [GHIDRA] Buscar Strings
tasks.detail: Busca todas as strings no binario (URLs, chaves, paths)

tasks.label: [GHIDRA] Listar Exports
tasks.detail: Lista simbolos exportados do binario

tasks.label: [GHIDRA] Listar Imports
tasks.detail: Lista simbolos importados do binario

tasks.label: [JADX] Decompilar APK
tasks.command: jadx -d jadx_output --deobf "${input:apkPath}"; Write-Host 'Decompilado em: jadx_output/' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Decompila APK para codigo Java com deobfuscacao

tasks.label: [JADX] Extrair Manifest
tasks.command: jadx -d jadx_output --single-class AndroidManifest "${input:apkPath}" 2>$null; if (Test-Path jadx_output/resources/AndroidManifest.xml) { Get-Content jadx_output/resources/AndroidManifest.xml } else { Write-Host 'Decompilando primeiro...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; jadx -d jadx_output "${input:apkPath}" 2>$null; Get-Content jadx_output/resources/AndroidManifest.xml }
tasks.detail: Extrai AndroidManifest.xml decodificado

tasks.label: [JADX] Buscar URLs/IPs no Codigo
tasks.detail: Busca URLs e IPs hardcoded no codigo decompilado

tasks.label: [JADX] Buscar Crypto no Codigo
tasks.detail: Busca implementacoes criptograficas no codigo

tasks.label: [JADX] Buscar API Keys/Secrets
tasks.detail: Busca API keys, secrets e tokens hardcoded

tasks.label: [JADX] Listar Permissoes
tasks.command: if (Test-Path jadx_output/resources/AndroidManifest.xml) { Select-String -Path jadx_output/resources/AndroidManifest.xml -Pattern 'uses-permission' } else { Write-Host 'Decompile o APK primeiro com [JADX] Decompilar APK' -ForegroundColor Red }
tasks.detail: Extrai todas as permissoes do AndroidManifest

tasks.label: [JADX] Listar Native Libs (.so)
tasks.detail: Lista bibliotecas nativas (.so) do APK decompilado

tasks.label: [LDPLAYER] Listar Instancias
tasks.detail: Lista todas as instancias LDPlayer com detalhes

tasks.label: [LDPLAYER] Iniciar Instancia
tasks.detail: Inicia instancia LDPlayer pelo index

tasks.label: [LDPLAYER] Parar Instancia
tasks.detail: Para instancia LDPlayer pelo index

tasks.label: [LDPLAYER] Parar Todas
tasks.command: ldconsole.exe quitall; Write-Host 'Todas as instancias paradas!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Para todas as instancias LDPlayer

tasks.label: [LDPLAYER] Instalar APK
tasks.detail: Instala APK na instancia LDPlayer

tasks.label: [LDPLAYER] Perfil Device Real
tasks.command: ldconsole.exe modify --index ${input:ldInstance} --manufacturer Samsung --model SM-S911B --pname ${input:deviceProfile}; Write-Host 'Perfil aplicado: ${input:deviceProfile}' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Aplica perfil de dispositivo real (Samsung, Pixel, Xiaomi, etc)

tasks.label: [LDPLAYER] Randomizar Device
tasks.command: C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe -c "import random,subprocess,string; imei=''.join([str(random.randint(0,9)) for _ in range(15)]); mac=':'.join(['%02x'%random.randint(0,255) for _ in range(6)]); aid=''.join(random.choices(string.hexdigits[:16],k=16)); phone='+55119'+str(random.randint(10000000,99999999)); subprocess.run(['ldconsole.exe','modify','--index','${input:ldInstance}','--imei',imei,'--mac',mac,'--androidid',aid,'--phonenum',phone]); print(f'IMEI: {imei}'); print(f'MAC: {mac}'); print(f'AID: {aid}'); print(f'Phone: {phone}')"
tasks.detail: Randomiza IMEI, MAC, Android ID e telefone da instancia

tasks.label: [LDPLAYER] Definir GPS
tasks.detail: Define localizacao GPS fake na instancia

tasks.label: [LDPLAYER] Clonar Instancia
tasks.detail: Clona instancia LDPlayer existente

tasks.label: [LDPLAYER] Ativar/Desativar Root
tasks.command: ldconsole.exe modify --index ${input:ldInstance} --root 1; Write-Host 'Root ativado na instancia ${input:ldInstance}!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Ativa root na instancia LDPlayer

tasks.label: [BLUESTACKS] Listar Instancias
tasks.detail: Lista instancias do BlueStacks

tasks.label: [BLUESTACKS] Conectar ADB
tasks.detail: Conecta ADB ao BlueStacks (porta padrao 5555)

tasks.label: [MEMU] Listar Instancias
tasks.detail: Lista todas as instancias MEmu

tasks.label: [MEMU] Iniciar Instancia
tasks.command: memuc start -i ${input:ldInstance}; Write-Host 'MEmu instancia iniciada!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Inicia instancia MEmu pelo index

tasks.label: [MEMU] Conectar ADB
tasks.detail: Conecta ADB ao MEmu (porta padrao 21503)

tasks.label: [NOX] Listar Instancias
tasks.detail: Lista todas as instancias NoxPlayer

tasks.label: [NOX] Iniciar Instancia
tasks.command: NoxConsole.exe launch -name:nox-${input:ldInstance}; Write-Host 'NoxPlayer instancia iniciada!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Inicia instancia NoxPlayer

tasks.label: [NOX] Conectar ADB
tasks.detail: Conecta ADB ao NoxPlayer (porta padrao 62001)

tasks.label: [NOX] Parar Todas
tasks.command: NoxConsole.exe quitall; Write-Host 'Todas as instancias Nox paradas!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Para todas as instancias NoxPlayer

tasks.label: [WIRESHARK] Capturar Trafego
tasks.command: Write-Host 'Capturando por 60s na interface ${input:captureInterface}...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; tshark -i '${input:captureInterface}' -f '${input:captureFilter}' -w capture_$(Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss').pcap -a duration:60; Write-Host 'Captura salva!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Captura trafego de rede por 60 segundos

tasks.label: [WIRESHARK] Analisar PCAP
tasks.detail: Analisa pcap com estatisticas de I/O, conversas e endpoints

tasks.label: [WIRESHARK] Extrair DNS Queries
tasks.detail: Extrai todas as queries DNS do pcap

tasks.label: [WIRESHARK] Extrair HTTP Requests
tasks.command: tshark -r '${input:pcapFile}' -Y 'http.request' -T fields -e http.request.method -e http.host -e http.request.uri -E separator='|'
tasks.detail: Extrai requests HTTP (method, host, URI)

tasks.label: [WIRESHARK] Buscar Credenciais
tasks.command: tshark -r '${input:pcapFile}' -Y 'http.authorization or ftp.request.command == USER or ftp.request.command == PASS or smtp.auth or pop.request' -T fields -e ip.src -e ip.dst -e http.authorization -e ftp.request.arg
tasks.detail: Busca credenciais em texto claro (HTTP Basic, FTP, SMTP)

tasks.label: [WIRESHARK] TLS Handshakes
tasks.command: tshark -r '${input:pcapFile}' -Y 'tls.handshake.type == 1' -T fields -e ip.dst -e tls.handshake.extensions_server_name -e tls.handshake.version -E separator='|'
tasks.detail: Extrai info de TLS handshakes (SNI, versao)

tasks.label: [WIRESHARK] Seguir Stream TCP
tasks.detail: Segue primeira stream TCP (mostra dados completos)

tasks.label: [WIRESHARK] Hierarquia de Protocolos
tasks.detail: Mostra hierarquia de protocolos do pcap

tasks.label: [WIRESHARK] Listar Interfaces
tasks.detail: Lista interfaces de rede disponiveis para captura

tasks.label: [BURP] Iniciar Active Scan
tasks.detail: Inicia active scan no Burp Suite via REST API

tasks.label: [BURP] Ver Issues/Vulns
tasks.command: C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe -c "import requests,json; r=requests.get('http://127.0.0.1:1337/v0.1/scan'); data=r.json(); [print(f\"[{i.get('severity','?')}] {i.get('name','?')} - {i.get('origin','')}{i.get('path','')}\") for i in data.get('issue_events',[])]"
tasks.detail: Lista vulnerabilidades encontradas pelo Burp

tasks.label: [BURP] Historico do Proxy
tasks.command: C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe -c "import requests,json; r=requests.get('http://127.0.0.1:1337/v0.1/proxy/history'); data=r.json(); [print(f\"{i.get('method','')} {i.get('host','')}{i.get('url','')}\") for i in data[:50]]"
tasks.detail: Mostra ultimas 50 requisicoes do proxy Burp

tasks.label: [NUCLEI] Scan Completo
tasks.command: nuclei -u ${input:scanTarget} -severity critical,high,medium -o nuclei_results.txt; Write-Host 'Resultados em nuclei_results.txt' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Scan nuclei completo (critical + high + medium)

tasks.label: [NUCLEI] Scan CVE Especifico
tasks.command: nuclei -u ${input:scanTarget} -tags cve -severity critical,high -o nuclei_cve.txt; Write-Host 'CVEs em nuclei_cve.txt' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Scan focado em CVEs criticos e altos

tasks.label: [NMAP] Port Scan
tasks.command: nmap -sC -sV -oN nmap_scan.txt ${input:scanTarget}; Write-Host 'Resultado em nmap_scan.txt' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Nmap scan com scripts e deteccao de versao

tasks.label: [NMAP] Scan Vuln Scripts
tasks.command: nmap --script vuln -oN nmap_vuln.txt ${input:scanTarget}; Write-Host 'Resultado em nmap_vuln.txt' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Nmap com scripts de vulnerabilidade

tasks.label: [SQLMAP] SQL Injection Test
tasks.detail: Testa SQL injection com SQLMap (nivel 3, risco 2)

tasks.label: [FFUF] Directory Fuzzing
tasks.detail: Fuzzing de diretorios com ffuf

tasks.label: [SUBFINDER] Enum Subdominios
tasks.command: subfinder -d ${input:scanTarget} -o subdomains.txt; Write-Host 'Subdominios em subdomains.txt' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Enumeracao de subdominios

tasks.label: [OBJECTION] Explore App
tasks.detail: Inicia sessao interativa objection explore no app

tasks.label: [OBJECTION] Disable SSL Pinning
tasks.detail: Inicia objection com SSL pinning desativado

tasks.label: [OBJECTION] Disable Root Detection
tasks.detail: Inicia objection com deteccao de root desativada

tasks.label: [OBJECTION] Dump Keystore
tasks.detail: Dump de entradas do Android Keystore

tasks.label: [OBJECTION] Patch APK (Inject Frida)
tasks.command: objection patchapk --source "${input:apkPath}"; Write-Host 'APK patcheado com Frida gadget!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Patcha APK com Frida gadget para injecao persistente

tasks.label: [OBJECTION] Listar Activities
tasks.detail: Lista activities do app Android

tasks.label: [APKTOOL] Decode APK
tasks.command: apktool d "${input:apkPath}" -o apktool_output -f; Write-Host 'APK decoded to apktool_output/' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Decodifica APK com APKTool (resources + smali)

tasks.label: [APKTOOL] Rebuild + Sign APK
tasks.command: apktool b apktool_output -o rebuilt.apk; Write-Host 'Signing APK...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; apksigner sign --ks debug.keystore --ks-pass pass:android rebuilt.apk; Write-Host 'rebuilt.apk signed and ready!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Rebuild APK from smali + sign with debug keystore

tasks.label: [ANDROGUARD] Security Audit
tasks.command: C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe -c "from androguard.misc import AnalyzeAPK; a,d,dx=AnalyzeAPK('${input:apkPath}'); print('Package:',a.get_package()); print('Permissions:'); [print(' ',p) for p in a.get_permissions()]; print('Activities:',len(a.get_activities())); print('Services:',len(a.get_services())); print('Receivers:',len(a.get_receivers()))"
tasks.detail: Analise de seguranca APK via Androguard (permissoes, componentes)

tasks.label: [ANDROGUARD] Extract Strings
tasks.command: C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe -c "from androguard.misc import AnalyzeAPK; a,d,dx=AnalyzeAPK('${input:apkPath}'); strings=[s for d_ in d for s in d_.get_strings() if len(s)>8]; print(f'Found {len(strings)} interesting strings:'); [print(' ',s[:120]) for s in strings[:50]]"
tasks.detail: Extrai strings interessantes do APK via Androguard

tasks.label: [MITMPROXY] Start Proxy
tasks.detail: Inicia mitmproxy interativo na porta especificada

tasks.label: [MITMPROXY] Dump Traffic
tasks.command: $ts=Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss'; mitmdump --listen-port ${input:mitmPort} -w mitm_$ts.flow; Write-Host "Trafego salvo em mitm_$ts.flow" -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Captura trafego HTTPS via mitmdump para arquivo .flow

tasks.label: [SCAPY] ARP Scan
tasks.command: C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe -c "from scapy.all import *; ans,_=srp(Ether(dst='ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff')/ARP(pdst='${input:networkTarget}'),timeout=3,verbose=0); print(f'Found {len(ans)} hosts:'); [print(f'  {r.psrc} ({r.hwsrc})') for _,r in ans]"
tasks.detail: Scan ARP para descobrir hosts na rede local

tasks.label: [SCAPY] Port Scan
tasks.command: C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe -c "from scapy.all import *; target='${input:scanTarget}'; ports=[21,22,23,25,53,80,110,135,139,443,445,993,995,1433,3306,3389,5432,5900,8080,8443]; ans,_=sr(IP(dst=target)/TCP(dport=ports,flags='S'),timeout=3,verbose=0); open_ports=[p.dport for _,p in ans if p.haslayer(TCP) and p[TCP].flags==0x12]; print(f'Open ports on {target}:'); [print(f'  {p}') for p in open_ports] if open_ports else print('  None found')"
tasks.detail: SYN scan nas 20 portas mais comuns via Scapy

tasks.label: [R2] Analyze Binary
tasks.command: radare2 -q -e bin.cache=true -c 'aaa; iI; afl | head 30; iz | head 20' "${input:binaryPath}"
tasks.detail: Analise completa do binario: info + funcoes + strings

tasks.label: [R2] Disassemble Function
tasks.detail: Disassembla funcao especifica do binario

tasks.label: [R2] Decompile Function
tasks.detail: Decompila funcao para pseudo-C (requer r2ghidra)

tasks.label: [HASHCAT] Identify Hash
tasks.command: C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe -c "import re,sys; h='${input:hashValue}'; patterns={'MD5 (32 hex)': r'^[a-fA-F0-9]{32}$', 'SHA-1 (40 hex)': r'^[a-fA-F0-9]{40}$', 'SHA-256 (64 hex)': r'^[a-fA-F0-9]{64}$', 'SHA-512 (128 hex)': r'^[a-fA-F0-9]{128}$', 'bcrypt': r'^\$2[aby]?\$', 'NTLM (32 hex)': r'^[a-fA-F0-9]{32}$', 'MySQL (41 hex)': r'^\*[A-F0-9]{40}$'}; matches=[n for n,p in patterns.items() if re.match(p,h)]; print(f'Hash: {h[:40]}...') if len(h)>40 else print(f'Hash: {h}'); print(f'Possible types: {matches if matches else ["Unknown"]}')"
tasks.detail: Identifica tipo de hash por regex patterns

tasks.label: [HASHCAT] Crack Hash (Dictionary)
tasks.command: hashcat -m 0 -a 0 "${input:hashFile}" "${input:wordlistPath}" --potfile-path hashcat_output/cracked.pot -o hashcat_output/cracked.txt; Write-Host 'Results in hashcat_output/cracked.txt' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Crack hashes MD5 com ataque dicionario (mode 0)

tasks.label: [HASHCAT] Benchmark GPU
tasks.detail: Benchmark de performance GPU para todos os modos

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] Doctor
tasks.detail: Healthcheck completo: Python, configs, tools, permissions

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] Validate Configs
tasks.detail: Valida config.json, mcp.json e tasks.json

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] Run Tests
tasks.detail: Roda testes unitarios via pytest

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] Lint
tasks.detail: Lint com ruff (regras em pyproject.toml)

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] Export Report
tasks.command: C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe core/cli.py report --format markdown --output leviathan_report.md; Write-Host 'Report salvo em leviathan_report.md' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Exporta report de ambiente em Markdown

tasks.label: [WORKFLOW] Full App Pentest
tasks.command: Write-Host '=== LEVIATHAN FULL APP PENTEST ===' -ForegroundColor Magenta; Write-Host '[1/6] Extraindo APK...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; $p=(adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell pm path ${input:packageName}).Replace('package:','').Trim(); adb -s ${input:adbDevice} pull $p app_target.apk; Write-Host '[2/6] Decompilando...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; jadx -d jadx_output --deobf app_target.apk; Write-Host '[3/6] Buscando secrets...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Get-ChildItem jadx_output -Recurse -Include *.java | Select-String -Pattern 'api.key|secret|token|password|AES|DES|XXTEA|http://|https://' -CaseSensitive:$false | Select-Object -First 50; Write-Host '[4/6] Bypass + Attach...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; frida -U -f ${input:packageName} -l core/ldplayer/frida_scripts/universal_bypass.js --no-pause -e 'setTimeout(function(){console.log("Ready")},3000)'; Write-Host '[5/6] Concluido!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Pipeline completo: Extract APK -> Decompile -> Search Secrets -> Bypass -> Attach

tasks.label: [WORKFLOW] Quick Intercept
tasks.command: Write-Host '=== QUICK INTERCEPT ===' -ForegroundColor Magenta; Write-Host 'Aplicando bypasses e interceptores...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; frida -U -f ${input:packageName} -l core/ldplayer/frida_scripts/ssl_bypass.js -l core/ldplayer/frida_scripts/network_interceptor.js -l core/ldplayer/frida_scripts/crypto_interceptor.js --no-pause
tasks.detail: Inicia app com SSL bypass + Network interceptor + Crypto interceptor

tasks.label: [WORKFLOW] Full Network Capture
tasks.command: Write-Host '=== FULL NETWORK CAPTURE ===' -ForegroundColor Magenta; $ts=Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss'; Write-Host '[1/3] Capturando trafego do dispositivo...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} shell su -c 'tcpdump -i any -w /sdcard/device_cap.pcap -c 10000' &; Write-Host '[2/3] Capturando trafego local...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; tshark -i '${input:captureInterface}' -w local_$ts.pcap -a duration:60; Write-Host '[3/3] Puxando captura do device...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; adb -s ${input:adbDevice} pull /sdcard/device_cap.pcap device_$ts.pcap; Write-Host "Capturas salvas: local_$ts.pcap + device_$ts.pcap" -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Captura simultanea: trafego do dispositivo + trafego local

tasks.label: [WORKFLOW] Emulator Farm (Multi-Instance)
tasks.command: Write-Host '=== EMULATOR FARM ===' -ForegroundColor Magenta; for ($i=0; $i -lt 3; $i++) { Write-Host "Clonando instancia $i..." -ForegroundColor Cyan; ldconsole.exe copy --from 0; }; Write-Host 'Randomizando devices...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; C:\Users\Kishi\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\python.exe -c "import random,subprocess; [subprocess.run(['ldconsole.exe','modify','--index',str(i),'--imei',''.join([str(random.randint(0,9)) for _ in range(15)])]) for i in range(1,4)]"; Write-Host '3 instancias clonadas e randomizadas!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Cria farm de 3 instancias clonadas com identidades randomizadas

tasks.label: [WORKFLOW] APK Security Audit
tasks.command: Write-Host '=== APK SECURITY AUDIT ===' -ForegroundColor Magenta; Write-Host '[1/5] Decompilando...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; jadx -d audit_output --deobf "${input:apkPath}"; Write-Host '[2/5] Permissoes...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Select-String -Path audit_output/resources/AndroidManifest.xml -Pattern 'uses-permission'; Write-Host '[3/5] URLs hardcoded...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Get-ChildItem audit_output -Recurse -Include *.java | Select-String 'https?://[^\s]+' | Select-Object -First 20; Write-Host '[4/5] Crypto...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Get-ChildItem audit_output -Recurse -Include *.java | Select-String 'AES|DES|RSA|Cipher|SecretKey' | Select-Object -First 20; Write-Host '[5/5] Secrets...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Get-ChildItem audit_output -Recurse -Include *.java | Select-String 'api.key|secret|token|password' -CaseSensitive:$false | Select-Object -First 20; Write-Host 'Audit completo!' -ForegroundColor Green
tasks.detail: Audit completo: Decompile -> Permissions -> URLs -> Crypto -> Secrets

tasks.label: [LEVIATHAN] Status Completo
tasks.command: Write-Host '=== LEVIATHAN VS v14.2 - SYSTEM STATUS ===' -ForegroundColor Magenta; Write-Host '' ; Write-Host '[ADB]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command adb -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { $d=(adb devices | Select-Object -Skip 1 | Where-Object { $_ -match 'device' }).Count; Write-Host " OK ($d devices)" -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host '[Frida]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command frida -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host " OK ($(frida --version))" -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host '[Ghidra]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command analyzeHeadless -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host ' OK' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND (add to PATH)' -ForegroundColor Yellow }; Write-Host '[Radare2]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command radare2 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host ' OK' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host '[Jadx]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command jadx -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host ' OK' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host '[APKTool]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command apktool -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host ' OK' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host '[tshark]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command tshark -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host ' OK' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host '[mitmproxy]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command mitmproxy -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host ' OK' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host '[Nuclei]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command nuclei -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host " OK ($(nuclei -version 2>&1))" -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host '[Nmap]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command nmap -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host ' OK' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host '[Hashcat]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command hashcat -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host ' OK' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host '[Objection]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command objection -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host ' OK' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host '[LDPlayer]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; if (Get-Command ldconsole.exe -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host ' OK' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host ' NOT FOUND' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host '[Python]' -ForegroundColor Cyan -NoNewline; Write-Host " OK ($(python --version 2>&1))" -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host ''; Write-Host '=== MCP MODULES: 33 servers / 460+ tools ===' -ForegroundColor Yellow
tasks.detail: Verifica status de TODAS as ferramentas (ADB, Frida, Ghidra, Jadx, tshark, Nuclei, Nmap, Objection, LDPlayer, R2, Hashcat, Scapy, MITMProxy)
